com.bitwig.base.control_surface.iface

Interface RangedValue

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutomatableRangedValue, BeatTime

    public interface RangedValue

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addValueObserver(int range, org.mozilla.javascript.Callable callback)
      Add an observer which receives the normalized value of the parameter as an integer in the [0..range-1] range.
      void inc(Number increment, Number resolution)
      Increments/Decrements the value.
      void set(Number value, Number resolution)
      set the value in an absolute fashion, value will be scaled with resolution.

    • Method Detail

      • addValueObserver

        void addValueObserver(int range,
                    org.mozilla.javascript.Callable callback)
        Add an observer which receives the normalized value of the parameter as an integer in the [0..range-1] range.
        Parameters:
        range -
        callback - returning (int value)

      • inc

        void inc(Number increment,
       Number resolution)
        Increments/Decrements the value.
        Parameters:
        increment -
        resolution -

      • set

        void set(Number value,
       Number resolution)
        set the value in an absolute fashion, value will be scaled with resolution. Typically you would use resolution to specify the amount of steps you controller provides (ex. 128) and just pass the integer value as it comes from the hardware and the application will take care of scaling it.
        Parameters:
        value - integer value in the [0 .. range-1] range
        resolution -
